snippet.title: KILLSQUAD - Core UPDATE
snippet.description:
Buy the game here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/910490 

Killsquad is an action-packed 4 player coop game where bounty hunters raid planets seeking fame and fortune. The game features four character classes with unique skill trees, three worlds to explore on a 20+ mission campaign, dozens of enemies & epic boss battles, and loot to build up your hero.

CORE brings deep changes to all internal game systems, making a huge impact on your Killsquad experience. Our vision throughout this year has been: which core systems make Killsquad fun, and which systems should be improved? We vowed to fix all of them in a single, mega-update. Welcome to CORE, we hope you like it.

KILLSQUAD is built on Unreal Engine to reach indie AAA production values. 

Please support us: 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/killsquadgame
Discord: https://discord.gg/killsquad
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/novarama_official/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pg/Killsquad-2214554828614147
